name: Sprout Dash
description:
Help cheer on the lil sprout for his big race! There's many obstacles in the way, but you know he can do it! Don't give up!

Run into clouds to refill your Water Gauge. Grow the Sprout by raining on him, so he can run past sleeping bears. Don't grow too tall though, or you might bump into a birb. Rain on flower buds to gain wholesomeness and sweet extra points. Drop a Energy Sports Drink on the sprout to give him the electrolytes that plants crave!

This was a game made for the Wholesome Jam #wholesomejam ! <3

[Controls]

Movement - WASD
Rain - J
Drop Energy Drink - K
Pause - Esc
